attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE it had the audacity to ask for my number. under my first amendment i have to RIGHT to make an account without my phone number🙄

attributes.review: I downloaded the app today and some how my phone got covered on Cheeto dust. Every time I would clean it off I would the app ping “all lives matter” and put a maga hat with more Cheeto dust on my phone. DELETE THIS APP NOW!

attributes.review: I was looking for a reason why anyone in their right mind would vote for trump and I still have no idea, he’s racist, homophobic and a white supremacist. Horrible. Trump 2020😻✨but on a gravestone🧚‍♀️🤩. If I could give it 0 stars I would.

attributes.review: I HATE THIS APP! It took forever to download. My goldfish has a hard time using the app. It doesn’t even come with stickers. When even my cat uses it, he cry’s because of the 🍊 background. It’s a no❤️
